doc_class_description: A Court of Appeal judgment is a higher court ruling that reviews decisions of lower courts, shaping legal precedent and protecting citizens’ rights.

latest_doc_d.description: Ganithage Ranasinghe Vs Director-General, Commission to Investigate Allegations of Bribery or Corruption, before Hon. B. Sasi Mahendran, J.
latest_doc_d.parties: Ganithage Ranasinghe Vs Director-General, Commission to Investigate Allegations of Bribery or Corruption,
latest_doc_d.keywords: discrepancy, participant witnesses as opposed to passive-observer-witnesses, not deliberate, errors of memory, faulty observation or lack of skill in observation
latest_doc_d.legistation: Section 19(b) and (c) of the Bribery Act.
